title.narrative: United Kingdom National Commission for the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation

description.narrative: This activity (United Kingdom National Commission for the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation) is a component of United Kingdom National Commission for the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £1,646,114. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Multisector aid, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). The start date is 01-12-2014 and the end date is 31-12-2021.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
